Class Robber

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Robber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Baddie, Selectable

    public class Robber
extends GameObject
implements Selectable, Baddie
    This class represents a Robber within the game, which can rob Buildings and be captured by Cops.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageIcon

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon()
        This method can be used to return the Cop's image, for game display purpouses. It will return a different image depending on the Cop's current state.
        Overrides:
        getImageIcon in class GameObject
        Returns:
        The ImageIcon that contains the graphic of the cop's state

      • select

        public void select()
        This method toggles the selection / deselection of this Cop. If this Cop is selected, it will have a red border around the square. If not, it won't.
        Specified by:
        select in interface Selectable
        Overrides:
        select in class GameObject
